about_the_game: You may no longer be in administration but, with no players under contract and nothing in the transfer budget, the start of the season looms large with plenty of work still to do. Can you assemble a squad of free agents and guide the club to safety?
detailed_description: You may no longer be in administration but, with no players under contract and nothing in the transfer budget, the start of the season looms large with plenty of work still to do. Can you assemble a squad of free agents and guide the club to safety?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11.6, 10.12.6, 10.13.6, 10.14.6, 10.15 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo – 1.8 GHz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 – 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: macOS 10.14 and later requires Metal 1; macOS 10.13 and earlier requires OpenGL 2.1

name: Football Manager 2021 Touch - Rise from the Ashes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1), 8/8.1, 10 (Update 1803/April 2018 or later) – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 (64-bit), Intel Core 2 or AMD Athlon 64 – 2.2 GHz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 – 256MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: You may no longer be in administration but, with no players under contract and nothing in the transfer budget, the start of the season looms large with plenty of work still to do. Can you assemble a squad of free agents and guide the club to safety?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Dutch, Greek, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
